content.detailedDescription: Multiple lights at different altitudes all solid in nature with no sounds at all traveling in different directions becoming increasing in number as each nights progresses
content.summary: Multiple lights appearing traveling in diff dir at diff alt no sounds

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my girlfriends house on willow creek road, and we were just talking by my truck before i walked her inside. as we turned around and was about to walk her inside the whole neighbor lit up a bright neon blue. like if the sun was shining. it was 12:36 am when this happened so it was dark and everything was lit up. i could see houses, signs, and cars. everything. we both instantly looked up and there was just a huge sphere like object treetop height over a houses across the street and it was rotating. you could see it spin. but it gave off no sounds. it did that for a good 9-10 seconds. we just stood there in disbelief because it was the first time that either of us seen anything like that. and then it after it hovered there for those seconds it just took off to the right and was gone in a second and a half or two. like nothing. no sounds or anything. i just saw the trail of light it left because it took off so fast. it was gone quick. never seen anything move at that kind of speed. we were quiet a few seconds after it happened and the first the she asked me was, "was that what i think it was?" and i said, "uh huh.." 
that was the closest encounter i've ever had and my first. i've had others after but not quite like that. it was amazing.
content.summary: When about to go inside we saw a bright neon blue object in the sky that rotated and gave light off like the sun.

content.detailedDescription: Reddish/orange lights appeared very near and sequenced down then across.They went out but came back on several times.They sequenced at times and other times a big bright light would come on then go back out.At one point a long series of lights came on at once.It looked like hundreds of lights in a close proximity across a uneven surface.I flashed my truck spotlight at the area they were to see if i could see a craft.Could not see anything.I flashed the lights to get a response.They responded by turning on a huge bright white/blue light that seemed to be coming from inside the craft as opposed to the surface.A plane could be seen approaching the area where the lights had been seen.I worried the plane may collide with it.No collision but the fact that the plane was not diverted from the area meant that it was not visible to air traffic controllers.It was a clear night.No clouds or lightening. nothing to explain the lights.Day view of the area and no towers or anything that could explain where the lights were coming from.I recorded the whole event except a few episodes of the lights on my smart phone.The video is way to large to send but it is extremely high definition quality.
content.summary: Light very near suddenly appeared.Flashed in a sequence down and then across went out and returned several times.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the passengers seat, riding home from a track and field event (5/23/15) at shippensburg university. looked off to my right and saw what thought might be a plane but quickly realized it wasn't moving and it looked odd. my witness was driving and couldn't make it out, said they did see something was there. it looked like two circle with a dark spot on the middle. i knew immediately that it was something unworldly(my opinion) and took out my iphone and took 4 pictures. a tree was in the way when i snapped the third picture and can't make it out from behind it. after the fourth picture i changed over to video and hit record. there were trees in the way again but a few second later the field opened up again and i could clearly see nothing. it was gone from the area.(i'm sorry for any profanity on the video buy it is important to me to let others know that the pics and video are only a second or two apart.) that it really. after i got home i blew up some of the pictures and even ran the best one thru some filters. the filter pic i think clearly shows better definition of the object(s). but my eyes saw it better than my iphone camera could. it was too faraway to get a good pic but i believe it's one of the best i've seen!!!
content.summary: Was traveling in car. it was hovering in the sky. looked like two circles with a dark spot in middle. disappeared ?

content.detailedDescription: This is another report that coincides with my report from june 2, 2015. these lights have been appearing every night for about five months. they appear at sunset. there are usually between four and five objects in the sky but do not produce enough light to photograph. there are two that are low enough in the sky to take photo's of and video. one of these ufo's produces a bright star like light. it is steady and does not blink. none of the ufo's blink they hover in the sky and make a very slow movement towards the north west. but you can see them clearly in the night sky. they have a clear difference between any satellites that are in the surrounding sky. with this report i am able to provide a few photo's of the lowest two in the sky. i am surprised that the object puts out so much light, but in a photo there is really very little to see. they just do not do it justice like witnessing this amazing thing with your own eyes. these are not drones. they are not satellites. these are the real deal. i believe that they are showing up, night after night. month after month, because they want the world to know they are here. showing consistency rather than appearing randomly as the reports have been made in the past. check out my photo's bring your own camera or video, come to boise. be ready to witness a possible new beginning for our world and reality. they will be here. shouting consistency for all to witness and begin this transition of our global consciousness.
content.summary: Ufo's still appearing every night at sunset. lighting up the sky for hours.

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were walking in joshua tree park, i saw a strange glowing light on the ground around 20-30 feet from me, i took a picture and then another as it shot upward at an angle.Then it was just gone, vanished.Pictures are very clear , not distorted. pinkish red with white spots. orb like.
content.summary: Walking in joshua tree park, orb rose up, snapped two pictures as it rose, got brighter as arose.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to laundry room at about 3:45 pm and about 15 feet before i walked in i looked up and saw round shiny object going east at a high rate of speed. after watching it for 2 seconds it flew at a 45 degree angle up and just turned smaller and a fine white tiny spot and i could not see it any more. sighting last no more than 4 seconds. was flying 10-15 times faster than a passenger airline at 30,000 ft. when it flew up at a 45 degree angle it flew much faster.No clouds or planes in the sky at time of sighting.
content.summary: Shiny object flying east

content.detailedDescription: I did not personally see the object, i was paying attention to my stopwatch and remote shutter for my canon 5d on tripod with a 75-300mm 1:4-5.6 lens which i was using to take sequential photos of a very bright setting venus. i didn't see the object until i reviewed the 57 images when i returned home which is approximately 1 mile west from the observation site. the object appears in all 57 images.  the object is first seen hovering at approx. 25 degrees high looking west then slowly ascending to approx. 60 degrees high looking just south of west and hovering there a few frames then with the attached photo it flashed down before hovering and what seems to be 'morphing'at appox. 17 degrees high looking west to the left of venus. i have had several sightings in the past starting in 1963 and am excited about what i caught knowing it's good evidence. i can provide 57 raw images...
content.summary: I was taking fixed sequential photos of a setting venus when the object appeared in all of the photos hovering, slowly ascending, rapidly descending hovering and morphing

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the back yard at around 9pm, probably a little later, as i do most every night.  i saw a light way up in the sky that looked exactly like the space station when it goes by except that the path of this light was coming from the north and heading towards the south east.  there were no clouds in the sky as i recall.  i watched the light only half interested since i have seen the space station go by many times.  the light was a grey color with no blinking lights, just a steady grey color.  

as the light crossed the sky, at about the 1 o'clock position vertical it began to grow really bright.  as it grew brighter it seem to be either growing in size or falling straight at me.  the light was a golden white color and became hard to look at.  i became concerned that it was was going to crash right into me.  then, it began to shrink and returned to the small grey dot and continued towards the horizon and eventually faded out of sight.  the light was so bright that i feel certain that there must be other witnesses, which is my main purpose in making this report.  

when the light faded out i felt no emotion about it at all.  i felt disinterested in it and went back in the house and watched some tv. 

the date i have given is an approximate.  i can't remember the exact night that it happened but, we returned from vacation on the 18th and it was shortly after that.  as i have already said, this light was really bright, like sun light bright.  other people had to have seen what i saw.
content.summary: High altitude light grew very bright and large then shrank and continued on way.

content.detailedDescription: The 3 ufos went from northeast to northwest, probably coming from lake st. clair. it was a slow steady pace and it couldn't have been any higher than 100 feet over the highest tree. i watched them until the trees got in the way, at which point the object on the right dipped down and going from this glowing beautiful red color to this deep orange color and a new triangle was formed it seemed.
content.summary: I was out back smoking when i saw the 3 lights shaped like diamonds and beautiful red.

content.detailedDescription: Well i feel crazy doing this and hope you all can tell me that i am. i live in new port richey florida approximately 30 miles north of macdill air force base in tampa florida. i hope you all can verify that maybe the military had a training flight of a stealth bomber north from macdill air force base. tonight. the avent started by hearing a low flying plane twice over our house. wondering what the plane was doing i stepped outside looked directly above my head and first saw a typical large military plane with three lights across the bottom and one in the front with the red blinking light in the middle. i looked slightly left and noticed a object triangle shaped three lights quiet that rotated in front of the plane and continued to fly in a straight path. kind of stunned i ran inside to grab my phone hollered at my son to come outside hurry when we got back outside both myself my son my mother could see two objects one with no flashing lights followed by another with flashing lights which was the plane. unfortunately i felt that a picture or video would do nothing as the two were too far away.I have no idea if macdill has been doing testing flights or training flights with a stealth bomber but i have never in 45 years seen this before. i was so shocked by what i saw i even text my oldest son and then called him. i told him what i saw and he said are you sure i said well i have goosebumps all over my whole body and feel crazy but i know i saw it.I've seen high flying military jets low flying military jets and helicopters and planes. i've seen planes coming in and out from every direction to tampa international airport i still have no idea what i saw tonight.I feel crazy i don't know if anyone else has reported seeing this but maybe you all could check into it. thanks. as i have read further in posting this i am a very good artist i would be more than willing to draw a picture of what i saw if that does any good i don't think it would but if you need it i will.
content.summary: Triangle object with three lights thats rotated once and continued in a straight liine followed by a plane with standard lights

content.detailedDescription: Mom and dad owned a fishing lodge about 80 miles north of ottawa at blue sea lake, quebec province.  one night a friend and i went to lock-up the chicken coup about 500 ft. from the lodge.  on the way back i found that i didn't need my spotlight any longer (11 pm) so i turned it off.  the entire parking lot was glowing red-orange.  suddenly we looked up and saw a bright red-orange orb.  this was in the middle of the forest away from town.  we watched it for a few minutes saying 'what is it?', then i spotted it with my lantern and rings eminated from it like throwing a stone in a pond.  that scared us and we ran into the lodge.  inside (the kitchen) was my mother and the bartender.  my mother looked out the window (she was glowing red-orange at that point) and said something like don't worry its probably nothing!  then the bartender stepped outside the door to have a look.  he was dressed in a white shirt and black pants.  his shirt was bright red-orange. my friend and i don't remember what happened after that, it's a blank.  my parents sold the lodge about a year later and we moved away.  lost touch with the bartender and not sure if he is still alive.  i will be 70 years old in november and my friend about the same.  just saw a page on facebook about red orbs, i was impressed about the sightings described all over the world (i thought we were alone).  sure curious about that lost time and my friend does not remember either.  i don't think my friend wants to talk about his experience.  i thought it was because he was in government but he is retired now.  i didn't talk about my experience (not too many people) because i was in the diplomatic corps and didn't want to lose my security rating but i am retired now.  p.S. my story is written-up in a book (out of print?) ufo encounters in canada by vickie cameron.  the story is entitled long lake light.
content.summary: Lit-up parking lot glowing orange-red.  radiated circles when spotted with sports lantern.

content.detailedDescription: In the summer of 1989 i was sitting inside with my parents [location removed/cms/jpg] who were playing dominos with our family friends who lived on the property behind ours. we lived in the sticks in texas, outside of a very small town. i was only 6 at the time but this is burned into my memory. i remember my sister running into our trailer house and she was white as a sheet and she could barely stammer out.. momma.. dad.. come outside now. all of us got up and ran outside and about 50 yards from the back of our trailer my sister had already arrived and was just staring up into the sky, it was quite obvious the instant we turned the corner at the back of the house what she was looking at. sitting there hovering no more than 50 feet above the tops of the trees (evergreen pine trees) was this gigantic triangle with reddish orange lights on each corner and a large one in the center. the large light wasn't originally lit up though, the other lights pulsated and then as they finished the one in the center lit up. i remember i was confused, and a little bit terrified. i remember my mom and our backdoor neighbors wife were both very very terrified and visibly shaking. i asked my mom what it was. she immediately said it wasn't from earth quite matter of factly as if there wasn't a question in her mind that it wasn't from here. i immediately knew she was telling the truth.. i just felt that this was something outside of our comprehension... and this was coming from a child who had just gotten his first video game console and was amazed by even that. we all sat there in perfect stunned silence for more than 15 minutes while the thing just hovered there without moving so much as an inch. then in a matter of a second or so you could see it start to move then *fwoosh* it was gone but there was a trail of the object as if you could see it still. it was so fast the light left behind showed a gigantic trail following in the direction the object went which was sw of the lat/lon i provided. many years later when we had moved into the city, my mother and i were watching unsolved mysteries and on the screen came the object we saw, we both began to get visibly upset as it still terrified us. it was reported as doing the same exact things it did with us, but it was over a german military base when it was reported.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with lights on each corner and one in the center.

content.detailedDescription: I was at an informal gathering of about a dozen people in a parking lot of an industrial building, and we all saw it.  i was the first to see it.  i just happened to be looking at the sky, it caught my eye and i thought it may have been an ultralight aircraft.  it had all the appearance of a delta-wing hang-glider style ultralight aircraft.  but it was white on the leading edges of the wing. the rest of the delta was either translucent or not there.  as i continued to observe it, it became apparent that it was a boomerang shape.  it was very high in the sky, over the clouds. way too high for an ultralight. over 5,000 feet at least. the object hung motionless in the air for a good 5 minutes.  it eventually morphed into a straight line, then into a ball, then back into a boomerang shape. it drifted slightly to the east while changing shapes.  after it changed back into a boomerang it started drifting faster and eventually was lost behind a cloud.  i searched google for an image and i found a story from 2012 that is the exact same thing i saw.  i did not see orbs, and i did not get a paranormal feeling.  i thought it may have been a weather balloon, but none of the images i found of weather balloons look like what i saw. here is the article with a photo. [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Boomerang shaped. white cloudlike surface. chaged shape to line, then to a ball, then back to boomerang.

content.detailedDescription:
i took a picture from close to my house on the bank of the coloradoriver,
   i took a very nice clear picture of the sunset with a thunderstorm behind the mountains directly west. i took the picture home and put it  my computer when i notice the object in the right lower corner. it looked silver with highlighted edges. i would like for someone at mufon to examine this picture to give it more scrutinty that i am able to. it looks alot like s ufo i saw in the late seventy's 1978 at fort huachuca az .It was also diamond shaped but was upside down and had glowing lights rotating. it was chased by two f-15's until they lost sight it took off and passed denver in less them one minute then went straight up according to libby army airfiele.
there was no news on tv or news paper of this event.Same as the one i am reporting today.
content.summary: Observed ufo in picture of thunderstorm, far right nw

content.detailedDescription:
It was the middle of august 2013 at 1:30 am. i saw a very,very, burn my eyes like a welding light bright whitish blue light in the trees behind the barn. i went to see what it was, sometimes i have creepers (transits) on my property. i usually scare them off. the light was in the trees. next thing i knew i just went to bed. not like me at all. i woke up with two bruises on my biceps, like thumbs would leave. when the bruises started going away under one was a circle of a triangle, like little freckles. under the other bruise on the other arm was a arrow triangle. i also have a semi-circle gouge on my arm, it now has a callus on it.
when i went to the doctor she asked me if i'd had any vaccinations and i said no. she didn't know what they were.
the sycamore trees behind the barn lost their bark in sheets on the south side. the branches higher up were not damaged. no i didn't think to keep a sample of the bark. some of the lower branches are still bent and brown.
it could not have been a helicopter, i heard no sound and the light was bigger than a helicopter size.
content.summary: It was the middle of august 2013 at 1:30 am i saw a very bright light in the trees behind the barn

content.detailedDescription: I was viewing the moon when i  witnessed a bright circular,spinning,flashing,floating circle that changed directions with quick movements  high in the sky. i took multiple videos and pics. i noticed a 2nd bright blinking light randomly encircling the  object in question.
content.summary: Bright flashing spinning circle floating with quick movements

content.detailedDescription: I got off work around 8:30 p.M. and made my way to exercise at the ymca. at the time i was on a call with my mother from the time i left work until i arrived at the y at about 9:00 p.M. i turned my car off and stepped out into the parking lot when i looked up into the clear night sky, and that is when i noticed the ufo. i told my mom "hold on a second" and continued to watch the ufo until it was too far off in the distance to clearly see. the ufo had a solid shape in the shape of a guitar pick and had nearly a hundred flickering lights on the belly of the ship. my sighting lasted about a minute or so before it was gone. i told my mom what i just witnessed and she called bologna. to this day i promise i know what i saw wasn't my imagination.
content.summary: Guitar pick in shape had maybe a hundred or so exterior lights the flickered

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside to take out the trash and looked up at the bright stars, this time i saw a very bright, bright light up in the sky.
my daughter and i saw this light over the street light and then it was joined by a less bright light on the right and another light on the left 
the two last lights seemed to move around a little, but the big one didn't move at all. then to the left another light appeared, a very bright red light, it stayed for a while and then started moving around in the sky coming towards us and  then they all left. i could see planes in the sky and these lights were brighter. they seemed to be cross shaped, and when they started to leave, lights on the sides of the cross appeared and little lights on the top. the red one stayed red. we watched for 30 minutes until they all left together.  my daughter and a neighbor all saw the lights.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Went out side to take out the trash and looked up at the bright stars, this time i saw a very bright, bright light up in the sky

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Nos encontrã¡bamos en plya vicente lopez x donde pasan aviones al encontrarse muy serca de aeroparque buenos aires,argentina, lugar x donde sobrevuelan para aterrisar, saque una serie de fotos a los mismos que paeaban y al mirar mi celu , despues mas tarde me di cuenta se los objetos q avia delante y mas arriba del avion q avia fotografiado...Uno parese ser un avion pero sobre ese mismo se ve un objeto q no parese ser avion x no tener las formas definidas.
content.summary: Saque foto y ahi me di cuenta, ante no

content.detailedDescription: i was working in my basement, when i heard trumpet like sounds echo's and several bright flash's in and around the house. these events occurred several more times during the night. an object appeared on my basement window, and it left a strange reflection.
content.summary: Several bright flash's in and around the house, object reflection appeared on window

content.detailedDescription: Me and wife had taken our son on atrip to london  about 160 miles from our home, we went to the diana's play area in hide park about 12 pm not long after that  i saw a big blue light in the sky ,i thought gosh big wing light on a plane  but no plane came into sight then from no where two smaller grey orbs appeared they moved in to a triangle and started to move into the clouds ,at this point a was shouting at my wife to take a picture as she had a camera but she though i was asking for my photo , so i have a photo of me looking up to the  sky. not sure of time and date but i could get all info off camera and bank statements . this is the second ufo i have seen in 1980 i was 12 years old and i was in alvingham  near louth lincs ,my home, it was a round 9 pm when me and my cousin saw a red glowing triangle  it made no noise and was not very big , it flew over us , it was going fast heading south we only saw it for a few seconds  .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw 3 orbs in the day time  one big blue one then two smaller grey ones.

content.detailedDescription:
5-31-2015 @~3:15am
i was at a cemetery which has a funeral home. i deliver newspapers. the funeral home is a business, they have a seven day subscription, it is my obligation to deliver a paper to them every day about 3-4am (approx.). i have a hobby and an interest in paranormal activity. i own a digital camcorder. i decided that on this night, i would drive through the cemetery and record with my video camera to then review later the footage for any clues as to paranormal activity. i drove through the darkened section of the cemetery where the grave sites were, about 6 minutes of raw video. i was the only one i know there at the time. it was a spur of the moment thing since i had previously captured evp elsewhere and suspiciously little at the cemetery and decided to investigate for that reason as well. i also noted no other cars in parking or anywhere else save for two vehicles owned by the funeral home, a hearse and a minivan.
i first noticed the object when i had finished my routes and had arrived home. i plugged my camcorder into my computer and downloaded the video. i then watched the video and discovered that there seemed to be the presence of objects and entities in the video, aside from the spiritual orbs which i had expected to see.
it looked like a triangle ufo, and the face of an grey alien, and at another point in the video, it was a hand of some kind coming down from outside the car to knock on the windshield from outside, and the images were detailed, so it appeared that the were non-terrestrial beings and images of one or more of their craft. this looks similar to some other sightings i had personally witnessed on other previous occasions.
it appears that at first, the object seems to have landed in a darkened section of the cemetery near a large communication tower possibly used by a local cable company which is headquartered across the street.
i was unsure of the lights possibly being a building of some kind, because it was possibly 300-400 feet away. i heard what i thought were disembodied voices similar to a distinct projected whisper, as if one were making use of their diaphragm while whispering.
i made it as far as i wanted to go, to the gravesite of a relative. i then turned around and went back around to where the grecian catacomb building was, and then slowed to a stop to readjust my 150 lumen led flashlight to affix it to the side of the camcorder so as to have them in parallel. i happened to be pointing the camcorder in the direction of the object which is seen through the windshield. i have made every attempt to debunk this, and have failed to explain it as a reflection or refraction of any light such as an interior light or the flashlight. this was near the center of the cemetery and there are no lamps or lights in the area, only 1-2 lumen solar stakes low to the ground. i also noted silence or absence of conventional aircraft. the video also reveals possible beams of light making a similar projection to the flashlight but from a different angle than i was holding it, seeming to come from above my open sunroof, which i intentionally to view the sky.
another major detail is the alien looking arm which is shown in the video coming down to knock on my windshield from outside and above. i did not see anyone else at the time, and the video ended abruptly when i thought i left the camera rolling to have spare to trim in edit, there were also grunting noises and possibly someone speaking outside my car but i didn't hear that either. there was an abundance of strange noises like air coming out of a canister or an low moaning uh noise.
the interesting thing is that i don't recall seeing the object in person, although it being a cemetery, having thought i wasn't truly alone anyway. i felt watched the whole time, and surprised to see the what the video revealed as i didn't recall noticing those details at the time, which is strange since you would think i would recall some strange arm knocking on my windshield when i thought i was the only one at a cemetery at about 3am, i rarely see anyone else and i always see them far off.
i also know this. i arrived at the cemetery at about 3am, and the video took all of 6 minutes to make, and then i was off and made note of the time after that a few streets away, and the time was about 3:30am.
i also don't remember being taken out of my car or leaving my car at all the entire duration of the filming of the video, so it is hard to say whether or not i was taken, only suffice to say i have missing time and the video doesn't match my recollection 100%. in other words, what my eyes may have seen, and what the camera recorded, were almost two alternate versions of the same thing.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, Unknown
content.summary: Triangle sighting concluded with knocking on windshield

content.detailedDescription:
Coming out of my sub on my way to a drs appt. making right onto hardy oak i. the stone oak area in san antonio, going east.

i looked up for no reason and there was a large ship traveling east to west across the sky.

we've been under floods for a month here in texas, it's been a disaster and we hadn't had a semi clear day in a month. there were large billowy clouds but mostly clear in some parts.

this wasn't a plane, a drone, this was a ufo, undeniably in the day. i never thought it was a plane. this wasn't some night blurb, i could see it clearly, i was surprised no one else could. i have a good camera on my phone but was too impressed, too unsure still at first, to in awe. i pulled over to watch it from my vehicle and it was  gliding, silver, not a disc, like a sleek, sleek zeppelin shape, not the width, just the length shape, very long, very very bright in the texas sun. 

i saw it glide across but made movements from up to down in some parts like it was unsteady, but it wasn't it was just able to do it without distress. no one saw. i saw, no one saw, it was so large, so impressive. i watched it and it went into a black cloud and never came out. it never came out the other side of it. it went into a dark cloud and never came out. it made me nervous, it confirmed it for me, any doubt i had left. i had no one to tell, it made driving in traffic to hold an appointment so stupid. nothing else i did that day or now, really means anything. 

my family kept asking for a video and bummed i didn't have one, but what would it have solved? nothing. it means nothing. all it would do is confirm fear. i'm glad i didn't record it, no one disbelieved me, i called the police, i asked if this was reported, he said no. i couldn't believe it, it was so huge, so plain in the day. 

in south texas were used to drug helicopters looking for dope crops and ranches manufacturing drugs but in the days before this happened, i noticed black helicopters, flying lower than the dea ones. i didn't think anything about it until now, until you asked in the questionaire about the type of helicopter.

that night i went outside to let my dog out and the sky was clear and the moon was bright and full and i normally lookup while she's in the yard and i go over my day, i thank the lord above for my health and ect. but that night, the sky became a menace, an echo and i knew i would see it again. that's what i was left with. an extreme feeling of a soon return. like they know i saw. and that's ridiculous to my logic but i feel strongly about it. 

i saw a massive football field sized ufo in 1995 in southeastern michigan after college once but that is it, never anything else and i've traveled long lonely distances at night, never saw anything. except that time and this one and both affected me the same way. i feel like i need to gather all the deer i can to keep them from hunters. i feel responsible to hide animals away from harm. i don't know what that means and why such a large gap between sightings and why i care. i should be relieved. i don't know what any of this means.
content.summary: Massive ufo traveling across a partly cloudy sky, flies into a dark cloud and disappears.

content.detailedDescription: I was talking to my minister neighbor across the fence in my back yard one day about where they were moving to for his next church  assignment. as the small talk went on he noticed what looked like a bright metallic balloon in the northwest sky. being inquisitive with what i was seeing i told him to hang on as i went to get my binoculars. when i came back out to check the object was still there. looking thru the binoculars didn't seem to sharpen up what we were seeing. i'd guess it was about a mile in the sky but very non descript as we both looked at it with the binoculars. it kind of looked like a really tall cylinder going top to bottom with a point on the top and bottom at the same time. the surface had a bright reflection on the object that seemed to roll around it like it was spinning real slowly. i watched it for about 5 minutes myself until the reflection that was going on with it kind of rolled into itself and totally disappeared. i watched the sky for 15 more minutes wondering if i had seen a balloon of some sorts but at the same time realizing the object was stationary when i watched it making it  not a balloon.
content.summary: A tall upward non-discript shape  turned in the sky reflecting into disappearring

content.detailedDescription: It was the 4th of july in yankton south dakota and the usual celebration  of partying known river boat days was going on the southern part of the city. there was a fireworks display set off around 9:00pm south across the river, probably only a quarter mile away, on the nebraska border for everyone to enjoy at the river boat day celebration. i was standing with hundreds of people watching fireworks being set off and enjoying what we were all seeing. as we were standing there looking to the south, i noticed the full moon that night that was a bit farther to the right in the sky than the fireworks were going off in. i was distracted briefly when i noticed what looked to be two huge cigar shapes close to one another (one slightly ahead of the other) traveling together what appeared to be between the moon and earth in space going from left to right. they were long huge dark cigar shapes that were very evident with the moon behind them. it took about 10 seconds for them to pass in front of the moon, and by the time they had passed hundreds of people were pointing at the moon and clarifying what i had saw. what ever we all saw were huge, and they definitely were in space as all they appeared to be were 2 very long and huge silhouettes going across our moon visual in space. i could draw a picture of the way this looked any time.
content.summary: While watching fireworks, 2 cigar shaped objects went between the moon and earth

content.detailedDescription: I observed a round spinning circular object floating and quickly changing directions in the night sky while viewing the stars and moon.
content.summary: While viewing the stars and moon i observed a bright orb like structure with quick movements hovering and rotating

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a cigarette break and was looking up at the sky, beautiful summers day hampstead, london and saw a matt metallic orb moving with purpose of action at incredible speed travelling miles in a split second, stopping abruptly and hovering in place before taking off again in a zig zag fashion even though it was a mile (max distance) or so away it was clearly spinning and you could see that by the distortion of air surrounding it almost like convection currents you would see rising from a hot road blurring the visuals also looked like something was dripping off it like molten metal. there was no sound whatsoever i.E. like a plan when it moves this was silent i would say the speed would be close to 5,000 miles an hour, instant acceleration accompanied by instant deceleration. this size of the object most have been huge due to distance and scale had to be easily larger than a double decker bus. i was working for an automotive magazine as their art director and called my chief editor (petrol head)  to take a look we both know about vehicles and speed etc. neither of us knew what it was, he proposed it was a weather balloon we both knew that was ridicules no weather balloon could move, change direction and jump from one end of the horizon to the other multiple times it is just not possible and we never talked about it again or at least he diffidently didn’t want to talk about the incident to anyone and i followed his lead everyone knows that people would just think your mad, the said incident took place in the summer of 1999 during my working week. at no point did a feel threatened by the object it seemed to be observing london was it alien, my feeling was it was very advanced tech, who was flying the vehicle that is a grey area indeed, i never lost sight of the object i returned to my work and it was still flying about when i finished observing it. i could have told others at the company to take a look but was concerned that someone would report it and we would all look like idiots for saying we saw a ufo and i was the first to see it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fast moving silent spinning metallic orb, 5,000 mph over london 1999.

content.detailedDescription: I was by myself at a little after 2:00am  and had just turned west off of i-29 on to highway 44. i was on my way home after being with friends in sioux falls earlier that whole evening. after a couple of minutes of driving west on this little 2-lane highway at about 70 mph, i noticed a light to my left over a plowed field that appeared to be about a hundred feet away. i looked back out the windshield in front of me and realized it was a totally clear night with stars in the sky, and no clouds or moon--in other words it was pretty dark other than this light to my left not too far(guessing 50 to 100 feet) away from the car i was driving. i glanced back left at the light again and realized this was really kind of weird the way in looked. i would compare it to like cigarette smoke hanging rolling around in a round fish bowl and the smoke lighting up and disappearing as it rolls around inside of the sphere. as i was driving west i noticed what ever this was to my left was matching my speed. thinking what i was seeing had a stupid explanation, i rolled down my window to make sure i wasn't getting a reflection of a light from inside my car that early in the morning that could be causing an illusion. as it turned out i was seeing the same thing with the window open. so i rolled up the window being scared now and stepped on the gas up to see if i could loose what was apparently following me. as i was gaining speed i was watching my speedometer and the rolling light at the same time. after driving about 15 seconds at 120 mph the light just disappeared. i don't think i slowed much below a 100 mph the rest of the way home. still kind of shook up, after getting home i called the sheriff in parker south dakota at 2:20am,and asked if anyone had reported anything like what i saw... he asked me what i was on which totally pissed me off and i hung up. i have never really talked about this experience again until about the last 10 years. i have also seen many other things that i will continue to list on this site till i have them all down.
content.summary: A light to my left caught my eye as i was going home at around 2:00am

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my den, facing the heavily wooded back yard, i observed a bright green light just above the treetops (trees are over 100 feet tall and obscured vision of light source). the light was traveling from the direction of zena reservoir no. 4 in a straight path in a westerly direction toward van dale road. it was silent, bright, green and not very large. it was around 9:00 pm and already dark. the light was bright enough to draw my attention away from reading my device. at first, i suspected a helicopter but then realized there was no sound, no doppler effect either. it was also too close to the treetops. it was only in my field of vision for a few seconds, long enough to register what i was seeing. immediately after observing it, i recalled another instance in the vicinity which i witnessed but that light was white. i also recalled a report in the vicinity of a green light on sawkill road.
content.summary: Bright green light, silent and fast moving from ne to nw above treetops
